mapper.select: select * from member where user_id=#{id} and STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into member values(#{id}, #{name}, #{pwd}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address},#{gender}, #{birthDate}, default, default, sysdate, default)
mapper.select: select b.BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, BOARD_COUNT from BOARD_SCRAP b join board A on b.BOARD_ID = a.BOARD_ID join member m on b.USER_ID = m.USER_ID where m.USER_ID = #{id} order by b.BOARD_ID DESC
